item.title: Chén Liàng (陈亮)
item.description: Full name: Chén Liàng (陈亮). Position: director (captain). Badge number 014590. Police station: Longtan police station, Taiyuan, Shanxi province.

item.title: Hú Zhēn (胡珍)
item.description: Nom complet: Hú Zhēn (胡珍) Position: Political commissar. Badge number 016428. Police station: Longtan police station, Taiyuan, Shanxi province.

item.title: Wáng Xiàoqí (王孝其)
item.description: Full name: Wáng Xiàoqí (王孝其). Position: deputy director (deputy captain). Badge number 016424. Police station: Longtan police station, Taiyuan, Shanxi province.
